course.subject: CHEM
course.name: Advanced Molecular Characterization Laboratory
course.description: This course is designed for chemistry major students who are enrolling in Pure Chemistry option. It provides students hands-on experience in the operation of different instruments including High Performance Liquid Chromatography (HPLC) and Differential Scanning Calorimeter (DSC) for characterization of organic products. For CHEM students under the four-year degree only. Students with minor in CHEM may seek instructorâ€™s approval for enrollment in the course.
